title: Bullshit
body:
Gangplank ain't dying that easy.

You can't fool me! 

My captain would never fall so easy! He always eats an orange and its K!

Hail muh Gangplank, the Pirate King!

replies.body: Nobody thinks that he's dead, but the point is that Miss Fortune is the new ruler of Bilgewater.
Killing "the king" doesn't make you the queen. That wasn't Sarah's goal.

btw j4 is bugged.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3wk9-_Z5ZoI
Something tells me that posting this to the head of the lore team will not solve your problems...

Who's to say it won't? You act like every Riot team is an island, which they constantly stress they work together. Your best bet is to get a Rioter to see it at all, and hope it'll be forwarded along as well as make a Bug Report thread.

Um, not really.

At most your fishing for dowvotes and making yourself look like an ass.

Its really not that hard to get a riot response if there is actual  substance to your thread.

Make a bug report, tag it as [Gameplay], give photo or video evidence, explain how you came across the bug, give steps on repeating it, and how often the bug will occur.
rito 1 building many work in so maybe they gonna tell some 1 and no im not going to post it to morello rito needs to figure stuff out themslefes.
How did they do that? So funny, rofllllllll

Y'now, we know that he's not dead. The fact that you disabled him in-game is the smoking Gun, I can believe that you'd kill a champion, but not outright disable him, that's be stupid and a slap in the face to people who like playing as that champion as well as paying customers.

No, I know what will happen, Gangplank will rise from the burning ashes of his boat, a little worse for wear, but without his crew, his gold, or his equipment, having to start from scratch. He'd then start assembling his old crew again, gaining respect and influence by battleing the other pirate gangs in Bilgewater, until he's strong enough to take on the woman ruining his cit- HEY WAIT A FUCKING SECOND THERE, ARE YOU MAKING THE PIRATE VERSION OF SAINTS ROW 2?

I can't believe I never saw it

DAMMIT RIOT

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5TWEIlwT,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-07-29T23:33:49.996+0000)
>
> Killing "the king" doesn't make you the queen. That wasn't Sarah's goal.

why do you guys ALWAYS conclude stories with cliffhangers that will never be told?
i doubt will happen this time since... gankplank is disabled.
Yeah, yeah, yeah, Gangplank will emerge from  the shadows with a new and more powerful mysterious weapon and Bilgewater will be at war still.

I see. Sarah's actions were not very thought-through, and it caused the town to erupt in chaos, and gang wars and such.  People will fight in a gang war until somebody comes along and takes the throne.

https://nypdecider.files.wordpress.com/2015/05/gotham-gof3.gif
(for all you Gotham fans out there)
Holy shit... I love Gotham. +1 for the reference.

> [{quoted}](name=DWT12345,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5TWEIlwT,comment-id=000000010001,timestamp=2015-07-29T23:43:46.909+0000)
>
> I see. Sarah's actions were not very thought-through, and it caused the town to erupt in chaos, and gang wars and such.  People will fight in a gang war until somebody comes along and takes the throne.
> 
> https://nypdecider.files.wordpress.com/2015/05/gotham-gof3.gif
> (for all you Gotham fans out there)

Well, Sarah's main reason for staying alive was getting revenge on Gangplank. Once all is said and done, the question for her is, "What now?"

Kill more.

....Facepalm

Killing the King is an extravagantly bad idea. You remake a character, dabble in their story and identity. (Yes, dabble, one story does not a character make), and then cut them off at the knees where their future is concerned? Come on man! If this is a big joke, it's not really funny. Next time, leave the little lock symbol that says "more coming soon" "unlock in three days", or tell us. You didn't redo trundle only to kill him off. THAT would have been an EPIC mistake. I thought you learned something?
Naw you gotta reach the other side of the board for that.
Is Sarah A thirteen year old on call of duty t-bagging Gangplank? IS SHE?
ayyyyy lmaokai
tfw riot kills off the character the whole event is based around just to cater to feminists..
Ah no, she just turned the town into a chaotic hellhole. She has CHANCES to becoming the ruler. But she sure wasn't the only one waiting for Gangplank to fall...
She isn't the new ruler. The MF lore says that there's a huge battle starting after she killed GP. She doesn't really want to be in charge. Probably.
Not even death can stop the oranges. {{item:3902}}

I think that this will throw Bilgewater in chaos.
Even if Gp is not dead, he has lost credibility and power... and Sarah will abuse of that. Guess there won' t be a total ruler for a while.

Not completely sold on that.  I know that if the entire town witnessed him on a ship that got completely destroyed, and he walked out of it completely K, it'd make him look pretty tough as nails.

Only thing to do is watch and wait.  And popcorn.
Plot Twist, Tahm Kench saves Gangplank. and Now they have a deal.

>My captain

I've got some bad news for ya. And that's a hot crazy red headed chick coming to shoot you in the head.

I have a very impressive stock of oranges.

I think I'll be K
don't worry, gangplanck is Lol's Jesus
I thought that was {{champion:266}}
What about {{champion:154}}  ?
touché, myfriend
Horror movie rule number 1 . If there is no body, then the bad guy (in this case GP) isn't really dead....

Well, Graves did mention how the thing was dyed red with the blood of Gangplank and his men, implying he did see Gangplank's corpse.

Remember that a part of the reason why they made this lore overhaul was to include stories in which they could kill characters.

I disagree, I think they were just clarifying that it's GPs crew who were the victims of the attack.  If it just said "The sea was red with the blood" after seeing an explosion overhead, the audience might be pretty confused.

Maybe {{champion:223}} will get involved? He seems to like getting people out of impossible situations, for a price. And we know he's associated in some ways with Bilgewater, but he hasn't appeared in the story yet...
I can't wait to see how Gangplank gets his revenge, cause that man aint dying so easily.

So this is how they planned to kill of a champion from LoL.

Yep. I heard rumors of heresay, maybe  they were true considering, and I kept those rumors. They didn't spread very much from earlier this year (2015).

I wonder what they are going to do for the epilogue.

*Gasp* maybe a video?
RIOT GIVE ME GP OR GIVE ME FREE RIOT POINTS CUZ YOU GUYS ARE ACTING LIKE A WORD I CANT SAY AROUND YOUNG CHILDREN. HAIL TO THE KING
How many other champions available to play?

> [{quoted}](name=Shénzhì,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5TWEIlwT,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-07-29T23:59:43.777+0000)
>
> How many other champions available to play?

What if he doesn't care about the lore and just wants to play Gangplank? Too bad? Take part in our event anyways?

"Sorry, our mandated version of fun is mandatory here in the United Riot Socialist Republic. Obey or be sent to gulag."

What if i don't care about bugs and still want to play champs who are disabled? nope fuck you is not able.

same thing.
Relax, you can live without him for a week.
They just need Gankplank + Spooky Gangplank to be gifted to everyone. And have Spooky be the only available thing to pick.
www.youtube.com/watch?v=g-VBwa2FY5M
